front.title: Low Density Parity Check (LDPC) Staircase and Triangle Forward Error Correction (FEC) Schemes

abstract.t: This document describes two Fully-Specified FEC Schemes, LDPC- Staircase and LDPC-Triangle, and their application to the reliable delivery of data objects on the packet erasure channel (i.e., a communication path where packets are either received without any corruption or discarded during transmission). These systematic FEC codes belong to the well known class of ``Low Density Parity Check'' (LDPC) codes, and are large block FEC codes in the sense of RFC3453.
